snippet: Thomas J. Curry, who has been leading the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency for six weeks, wants to refocus the mission of the agency by adding a dose of "healthy skepticism."
abstract: Thomas J. Curry, who has been leading the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency for six weeks, wants to refocus the mission of the agency by adding a dose of "healthy skepticism."

headline.main: With New Leader, Regulator Finds a New Direction as Well
